SELECT BizDocProcessList.* FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID ,A.InitiatorID ,A.InitiatorName ,A.InitiatorUnitID ,A.InitiatorUnitName ,A.StartDate ,A.EndDate ,A.DeleteDate ,A.ProcessState ,A.InitiatorSIPAddress ,A.DocSubject ,B.Subject ,D.BizDocFormID ,E.BizDocID ,'T006' as SubKind ,C.* FROM covi_approval4j.JWF_PROCESS AS A INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.JWF_FORMINSTANCE AS B ON B.FormInstID = A.FormInstID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS C ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_bizdocform AS D ON D.FormPrefix = C.FormPrefix INNER JOIN covi_approval4j.jwf_bizdoc AS E ON D.BizDocID = E.BizDocID WHERE A.ProcessState = 288 AND E.BizDocCode = #{bizDocCode} AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND A.ParentProcessID = 0
AND B.EntCode = #{entCode}
AND B.EntCode IN ('ORGROOT', #{entCode})
) AS BizDocProcessList
startDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND TIMESTAMPADD(Day,1,#{endDate})
AND
FormSubject InitiatorUnitName InitiatorName FormName FormSubject
LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND startDate BETWEEN #{searchGroupWord} AND TIMESTAMPADD(Day,1,#{searchGroupWord})
AND
InitiatorID = #{searchGroupWord} InitiatorUnitID = #{searchGroupWord} FormPrefix = #{searchGroupWord}
, Priority DESC
, startDate Desc
,
FormSubject InitiatorName InitiatorUnitName IsFile FormName DocNo StartDate StartDate
ASC DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
